  • Constructor Details

    • Airplane

      public Airplane​(java.lang.String icao24, java.lang.String callsign, java.lang.String origin_country, double longitude, double latitude, double baro_altitude, boolean on_ground, double velocity, double true_track, double vertical_rate, double geo_altitude, Flight flight, WorldMap map)
      Constructs an Airplane object with the specified information and associates it with a flight and a world map.
      Parameters:
      icao24 - the ICAO24 identifier of the airplane
      callsign - the callsign of the airplane
      origin_country - the origin country of the airplane
      longitude - the longitude of the airplane's current position
      latitude - the latitude of the airplane's current position
      baro_altitude - the barometric altitude of the airplane
      on_ground - true if the airplane is on the ground, false otherwise
      velocity - the velocity of the airplane in km/h
      true_track - the true track of the airplane
      vertical_rate - the vertical rate of the airplane
      geo_altitude - the geodetic altitude of the airplane
      flight - the associated flight
      map - the world map

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the airplane thread and performs its behavior.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread

    • flyTo

      protected void flyTo​(Airport port)
      Makes the airplane fly towards the specified airport.
      Parameters:
      port - the destination airport

    • calculateDistance

      protected static double calculateDistance​(double lat1, double lon1, double lat2, double lon2)
      Calculates the distance between two points on Earth's surface using the Haversine formula.
      Parameters:
      lat1 - the latitude of the first point
      lon1 - the longitude of the first point
      lat2 - the latitude of the second point
      lon2 - the longitude of the second point
      Returns:
      the distance between the two points in kilometers

    • getNearbyAirplanes

      protected java.util.List<Airplane> getNearbyAirplanes​(double radius)
      Retrieves the nearby airplanes within the specified radius.
      Parameters:
      radius - the radius in kilometers
      Returns:
      a list of nearby airplanes

    • handleCrash

      protected void handleCrash​(java.util.List<Airplane> nearbyAirplanes)
